description: Surrogate unique identifier for this row. Used as the primary key in imtbl_woap_meter.
Boolean-style flag indicating this is the primary meter controlling scheduling for the associated plan/asset (1 = true).
Foreign key to the related work order/activity plan (WOAP) record this meter applies to; exact parent entity name to confirm with SME.
Code for the meter type (e.g., miles, kilometers, engine hours). Drives units and interpretation of meter readings; reference master list.
Target reading at which the maintenance activity is scheduled to occur for this meter, in the units implied by Meter_Type.
Reading captured when the work began, in the same units as the meter type. Often blank if start reading was not recorded.
Reading captured when the work was completed, in the same units as the meter type.
Reading recorded if the scheduled activity was canceled at a specific meter value; usually empty.
Most recent meter reading at which the same activity was previously completed; used for interval calculations; confirm with SME.
Free-form options or bit flags controlling behavior for this meter link; meaning is system-specificâ€”confirm with SME.
System timestamp of the most recent update to this record (server time).
Timestamp when a user last changed this record (user-initiated modification time).
Identifier of the user who created the record.
Timestamp when the record was created.
Identifier of the user who last modified the record.
Timestamp of the most recent user modification.
